short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to play sometimes in your free time :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alien Escape Extension is an addon to your chrome new tab technology that allows you to challenge yourself in every search you make.
Feel free to beat your own high-score and challenge your friends and family to a fun time search experience.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Alien Escape Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Microsoft Bing.
